rules_text: {3}{U}{U}: Mistford Trickster can’t be blocked this turn. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each enchantment you control.
rules_text2: Create a Glamour token. [i](It’s a colorless enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
